summary: This document is an email chain from June 2020 among FBI personnel discussing the imminent indictment and arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. It details coordination with the Boston and Lowell Resident Agencies, the use of a mobile number to track Maxwell, and the push for an indictment by SDNY on June 29, 2020.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; FBI has a solid mobile number believed to be used by her and is planning to obtain a GPS warrant to locate and arrest her.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: FBI Special Agent in New York providing updates on the Maxwell investigation, coordination with other offices, and plans for indictment and arrest.

connections.description: SSA is leading or involved in the FBI investigation to locate and arrest Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Planned indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: SDNY is pushing to indict Ghislaine Maxwell on Monday, June 29, 2020.

events.title: Coordination for Maxwell's arrest
events.description: FBI is in touch with Boston and Lowell RA, has a mobile number for Maxwell, and plans to get a GPS warrant to locate and arrest her before the July 4th holiday.

events.title: Briefing of ADIC
events.description: The ADIC was briefed and will reach out to the U.S. Attorney SDNY to discuss the case.

keyFacts: The FBI had a solid mobile number they believed was being used by Ghislaine Maxwell in June 2020.
The FBI planned to obtain a GPS warrant to track Maxwell's phone location in Massachusetts.
SDNY was pushing to indict Ghislaine Maxwell on Monday, June 29, 2020.
The arrest was planned to be coordinated with the Boston and Lowell Resident Agencies before the July 4th holiday.
The ADIC was briefed and was to contact the U.S. Attorney SDNY regarding the case.
